name: STONE MASK OF PENITENCE
description:
Stone masks were created by the Inquisition in order to carry out the punishment of infidels, who were forced to wear this obtuse object filled with spikes (inside and outside) over their faces until second order. Most wouldn't survive the severe bleeding or the acute pain.
One day a man was unjustly sentenced to wear the Stone Mask of Penitence, he died within hours and so they removed the mask and tossed his body into a mass grave.
Since that faithful day, every time a new act of penitence is forced unto a innocent victim, the mask is said to cry rivers of blood from every thorn, crack and orifice.



800x800gif mouse drawn on a Deluxe Paint emulator for the MS-DOS
